snippet.title: Just In Time Incorporated
snippet.description:
On Steam: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/592030/Just_In_Time_Incorporated/

Twitter: @JustInTimeVR
Website: https://www.justintimegame.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JustInTimeIncorporated/

Just In Time Incorporated is a hilarious VR game about "Death Prevention Insurance" from, launching July 2017 for the HTC VIVE. You start as a new employee equipped with time-slowing "Hyper-Gloves." With these gloves you operate at hyper-speed, allowing you to even catch speeding bullets. It's a good thing too, because you'll need every second to save your clients from certain death in this goofy, action-puzzler, by Second Wind Interactive. Follow us on Twitter @JustinTimeVR for updates and announcements.
